Text: Thanks for this, pretty good quality for the age, 35 yrs.  Only wish King Kong was in it.

Heh Calisse.. Thnaks alot for this... 
given the rare if not unavailable footage of this band this is a gem..  a rare diamond.. Thanks again for sharing this. 
The cover is fantastic... the video, given the age and all is good quality... I cant wait to burn it and watch it on the big TV...  
Merci. sti..
